price: 108. Katakanlah (Muhammad), “Inilah jalanku, aku dan orang-orang yang mengikutiku mengajak (kamu) kepada Allah dengan hujjah yang nyata, Mahasuci Allah, dan aku tidak termasuk orang-orang musyrik.”
arabic: قُلۡ هَٰذِهِۦ سَبِيلِيٓ أَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۚ عَلَىٰ بَصِيرَةٍ أَنَا۠ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَنِيۖ وَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul hādhihi sabīlī adʿū ilā al-lahi ʿalā baṣīratin anā wamani ittabaʿanī wasub'ḥāna al-lahi wamā anā mina al-mush'rikīna
